Summary: Seen 3 glowing circles in a triange form the later 2 diamond shape objects
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around March 16th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my back yard laying back looking at the stars ,The sky was clear not a cloud in the sky and i saw a triangle shaped object with 3 glowing circluar orbs moving very fast from west to the east about 1000 feet up just guessing ,(hard to tell not knowing the actual size of the object)It lasted about 5-10 secs It was silent all i could hear was cars going by. At about 11:45 another object flew by this one i could not tell if it was one or two ,but they did move like they were two.By flying side by side moving close to each other and moving away from each other like a helix shape on there course of flight with two glowing diamond shapes.They were moving in a north east direction.this object i stood up and tried to get a better look but by the time i got up it was gone.
